content: the yarn leaving 6 tail thread it through the remaining sts pull them to close the crown finishing weave in all ends on the left side of the hat block to fit you may add a pom pom on the top many many thanks to my wonderful pattern testers enyo paulina maria socha jagienka agnieszka lenoklen elena pome © agata smektała 2015 3 charts charts show only 40 sts for full round you sholud repeat them 3 times reading from right to left please be aware that charts show odd rounds only even rounds should be completed by knitting the knit stitches and purling the purl stitches from previous round crown shaping last 13 rounds zzzzzzzzzzzzzdzzzzzzdzzzzzzzzzzzzdzzzzzd 13 szzzzzgzzzzzzdzzzzzdszzzzzdzzzzzzgzzzzzd 11 shzzzzgzzzszzgzzzzhdshzzzzgzzzszzgzzzzhd 09 shhzzzgzzdszzgzzzhhdshhzzzgzzdszzgzzzhhd 07 hshhzzgzrtyuzgzzhhhdshhhzzgzrtyuzgzzhhdh 05 yushhzdzrtyuzdzhhhhdshhhhzdzrtyuzdzhhdrt 03 yughhhggrtyugg<`~><pp>ggrtyugghhhgrt 01 body for beanie hat make those 20 rnds twice for slouchy make them three times set up rounds make only once <`~>ggrtyugghhhgrtyughhhggrtyugg<pp> 19 hhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrtyughhhggrtyugghhhhhh 17 hhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrtyughhhggrtyugghhhhhh 15 hhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrtyughhhggrtyugghhhhhh 13 <pp>ggrtyugghhhgrtyughhhggrtyugg<`~> 11 yughhhggrtyugg<pp><`~>ggrtyugghhhgrt 09 yughhhggrtyugghhhhhhhhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrt 07 yughhhggrtyugghhhhhhhhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrt 05 yughhhggrtyugghhhhhhhhhhhhggrtyugghhhgrt 03 yughhhggrtyugg<`~><pp>ggrtyugghhhgrt 01 <`~>ggrtyugghhhhhhhhhhhhggrtyugg<pp> set up rnd1 h rt knit c2f g yu purl c2b d <pp> k2tog c6f d <pp> p2tog c6fp s <`~> ssk c6b z <`~> no stitch c6bp pome © agata smektała 2015 4
